'''1.8.9 Build 3''' is the third and final build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.8.9, released on April 5, 2016, and the final version of ''MinecraftEdu'' before it was replaced with ''[[Minecraft Education]]''. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.8.9]].

=== General ===
